pageSchema:
{
  "renderer": "page",
  "body": [
    {
      "renderer": "table",
      "name": "TableTdSelect",
      "initApi": {
        "url": "/api/mock/td/select",
        "method": "get",
        "params": {
          "dates": "${dates}"
        }
      },
      "height": 590,
      "columns": [
        {
          "label": "企业",
          "name": "customer_name",
          "sortable": false,
          "fixed": false,
          "type": "-",
          "align": "none",
          "body": []
        },
        {
          "label": "PV",
          "name": "imp_cnt",
          "sortable": false,
          "fixed": false,
          "type": "-",
          "align": "none",
          "body": []
        },
        {
          "label": "UV",
          "name": "imp_num",
          "sortable": false,
          "fixed": false,
          "type": "-",
          "align": "none",
          "body": []
        },
        {
          "label": "点击量",
          "name": "click_cnt",
          "sortable": false,
          "fixed": false,
          "type": "-",
          "align": "none",
          "header": [
            {
              "renderer": "switch",
              "name": "click_cnt_checked",
              "type": "checkbox",
              "visibleOn": "data.showCheckbox",
              "classname": "td-select__check-all",
              "inlinePrompt": false,
              "triggered": "header_cnt",
              "rules": []
            },
            {
              "renderer": "html",
              "html": "点击量",
              "classname": "td-select__check-label"
            }
          ],
          "body": [
            {
              "renderer": "switch",
              "name": "click_cnt_checked",
              "type": "checkbox",
              "visibleOn": "data.showCheckbox",
              "inlinePrompt": false,
              "groupName": "header_cnt",
              "rules": []
            },
            {
              "renderer": "html",
              "inline": true,
              "html": "<%=data.click_cnt%>",
              "classname": "td-select__check-label"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "label": "点赞量",
          "name": "likes_cnt",
          "sortable": false,
          "fixed": false,
          "type": "-",
          "align": "none",
          "header": [
            {
              "renderer": "switch",
              "name": "likes_cnt_checked",
              "type": "checkbox",
              "visibleOn": "data.showCheckbox",
              "classname": "td-select__check-all",
              "inlinePrompt": false,
              "triggered": "header_likes",
              "rules": []
            },
            {
              "renderer": "html",
              "html": "点赞量",
              "classname": "td-select__check-label"
            }
          ],
          "body": [
            {
              "renderer": "switch",
              "name": "likes_cnt_checked",
              "type": "checkbox",
              "visibleOn": "data.showCheckbox",
              "inlinePrompt": false,
              "groupName": "header_likes",
              "rules": []
            },
            {
              "renderer": "html",
              "inline": true,
              "html": "<%=data.likes_cnt%>",
              "classname": "td-select__check-label"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "label": "评论数",
          "name": "clcted_cnt",
          "sortable": false,
          "fixed": false,
          "type": "-",
          "align": "none",
          "body": [
            {
              "renderer": "switch",
              "name": "clcted_cnt_checked",
              "type": "checkbox",
              "visibleOn": "data.showCheckbox"
            },
            {
              "renderer": "html",
              "inline": true,
              "html": "<%=data.clcted_cnt%>",
              "classname": "td-select__check-label"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "label": "转发数",
          "name": "bhv_num",
          "sortable": false,
          "fixed": false,
          "type": "-",
          "align": "none",
          "body": []
        },
        {
          "label": "开始时间",
          "name": "start_time",
          "sortable": false,
          "fixed": false,
          "type": "-",
          "align": "none",
          "body": []
        },
        {
          "label": "结束时间",
          "name": "end_time",
          "sortable": false,
          "fixed": false,
          "type": "-",
          "align": "none",
          "body": []
        }
      ],
      "actions": [
        {
          "renderer": "switch",
          "name": "showCheckbox",
          "type": "button",
          "target": "TableTdSelect",
          "defaultValue": false,
          "size": "small",
          "activeText": "取消",
          "inactiveText": "选择单元格",
          "rules": []
        },
        {
          "renderer": "action",
          "text": "生成推送任务",
          "plain": true,
          "size": "small",
          "actionType": "ajax",
          "actionApi": {
            "url": "/api/selectedRows",
            "method": "post",
            "params": {
              "*": "*"
            }
          },
          "body": {},
          "disabledOn": "!data.selectedRows.length || !data.showCheckbox"
        }
      ],
      "rowKey": "deliver_id",
      "title": "点击按钮，单元格进入选中态"
    }
  ],
  "mergeUrlQuery": true,
  "steps": [],
  "innerStyle": ".td-select__check-label {\n  display: inline;\n  vertical-align: text-bottom;\n}\n.td-select__check-all {\n  height: 23px;\n  display: inline;\n}",
  "initData": {}
}
